entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
